Photo: Twitter Source: Twitter Image 32 of 32 Democratic debate hosts mysterious wizard 1 / 32 Back to Gallery A political debate is a very serious topic typically and viewers often turn to the audience takeaways to people watch.
For the GOP debate, there was the "random hot guy" sitting behind one of the moderators. For the Democratic debate on Tuesday, it was a possible Santa/wizard spotted.
Social media immediately took notice and began sharing the photo of the audience member around the Web.
Many people were desperate to hear the mysterious wizard's opinion on the issues discussed.
Interested in Dumbledore's policies. RT @steveking_ : Wizard in audience. I repeat. Wizard in audience. #DemDebate pic.twitter.com/WvruremZB1
— Philip Lewis (@Phil_Cosby_) October 14, 2015 I would bet my life that the wizard on the right is feelin' the Bern. #DemDebate #FeelTheBern #DebateWithBernie #VT pic.twitter.com/0m6bR5oUbC
— allisondavis (@allisondavis) October 14, 2015 Our personal Texas/wizard favorite was when one user gave a shout-out to ZZ Top.
ZZ Top Santa is not impressed by Clinton's opener. #DemDebate pic.twitter.com/wnUle31l0m
— Sean Magers (@seanmagers) October 14, 2015 Or maybe the man isn't a wizard at all, but instead Joe Biden sizing up the competition.
Not Biden's best disguise, but it got him in the room. pic.twitter.com/LReIAyeKUh
— Jeff Loveness (@JeffLoveness) October 14, 2015 Click through the gallery above to see the mysterious audience member and other memes from the debate that perfectly summarize the topics covered.
